Agents Management Guide

A simple and clear guide to understanding and managing agents in Unit Master.

What are Agents?

In Unit Master, Agents are people who introduce clients to invest in your organisation’s funds. They help bring in new members and support client onboarding and account management.

The Agents List shows all agents registered in the system. From this section, you can add new agents, update their details, or change the agent assigned to a client.

1. Agents List

The Agents List displays all agents currently registered in Unit Master. It allows you to:

  • View existing agents and their details
  • Add new agents to the system
  • Edit or update agent information
2. Adding a New Agent

To add a new agent:

  • Go to the Agents section from the sidebar.
  • Click on Add New Agent.
  • Fill in the agent’s personal and contact details.
  • Click Submit to save.

Make sure the agent’s contact details are accurate because they are linked to multiple client accounts.

3. Changing a Client’s Agent

If a client requests to change their agent, Unit Master allows you to do so easily.

  • Select the client from the client list.
  • Navigate to their account details.
  • Change the assigned agent from the dropdown list.
  • Save the changes.
4. Agent type listing

Unit Master supports different types of clients, each linked to agents:

  • Add the agent type
  • fill the type name and description
  • Then you save
